data.title: Alternative Movie Reviews of Poseidon
data.meta_description: Critical opinions you won't see in the movie ads.
data.text:
Directed by Wolfgang Petersen, starring Kurt Russell, Josh Lucas, Emmy Rossum and Richard Dreyfuss.

“You start to realize that the capsized cruise liner onscreen isn’t the only sinking ship.” - Phil Villareal, Arizona Daily Star

“’Poseidon’ recognizes and encourages belief in the popular movie theory of The Survival of the Whitest.” - Ed Gonzalez, Slant Magazine.

“It’s Das Perfect Boot - with the characters compressed to wafers. And I mean that both ways.” - Carina Chocano, Los Angeles Times.

“A one-way all-inclusive ticket to the port of Achingly Earnest on the sunny shores of Dullsville.” - Brian Juergens, Freeze Dried Movies
